eventDecorators.name: ChangedBridgePool
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when staked tokens are withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: changeBridgePool
functionDecorators.description: Called by owner of the wrapper to change the destination of the wrapped ETH (bridgePool).

parameterDecorators.name: newBridgePool
parameterDecorators.description: address of the bridge pool to send Wrapped ETH to when ETH is sent to this contract.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: wrapAndTransfer
functionDecorators.description: Publicly callable function that takes all ETH in this contract, wraps it to WETH and sends it to the bridge pool contract. Function is called by fallback functions to automatically wrap ETH to WETH and send at the conclusion of a canonical ETH bridging action.
